subject: Read carefully to make your girlfriend happy
body:
You want to save your money and get licensed medications? I bet you do!
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
You will have sex all night long. You won't think about erectile dysfunction anymore.
Click here to have a nice dick
There is no need to go to your local drug store!
With best regards,
Amanda Wright
 
 
Drahub glubzhe Nadvinul kapiushon poverh svoego ustrashaiushchego shlema, staraias ogradit lico ot Letiashchih navstrechu snezhnyh hlopev, chare nedovolno vorchal, povorachivaia mordu to Vpravo, to vlevo v popytke uberechsia ot neznakomogo emu iavleniia. Kogda on budet Gotov k ispytaniiu, ia tebia pozovu. Eto mestnyj zhargon, ekvivalent Tomu, chto ty tolko chto proiznes. Ladno, ladno, ne budu sporit. 
Pered glazami na mig vstala iarostnaia vspyshka ognia, i mrak, nastupivshij Vsled za etim. Ih bylo ochen mnogo. Postoiav tak mgnovenie, ia plavno Opustil ego vniz, staraias ne narushit pri etom mirovoe ravnovesie. Ego Nezachem nosit s soboj, chtoby oshchushchat ego silu. Shefir naverniaka uzhe Obnaruzhil moe otsutstvie. Nebesnye Sily! Okazalos, chto many ne poddaiutsia poddelke, tak kak magicheski Transformirovany. Ona lezhala na krovati. A vot Kvin, s ego podrostkovoj neposredstvennostiu, ne osobenno-to i Strashilsia etih zhutkih sluhov, emu kazalos, chto pokrovitelstvo samogo Namestnika Haaskana ogradit ih vseh ot liubyh myslimyh nepriiatnostej, esli uzh ne Spravlius ia. 
Vse s toj zhe nasmeshlivoj ulybkoj Bigman vybrosil vpered Kulak. Chelovek sushchestvo, privykaiushchee ko vsemu, dazhe k tomu, k Chemu, kazalos, privyknut nevozmozhno. Sopia i otduvaias, tolstiachok-chuzhoj s treskom vybralsia iz zaroslej na Kraj priiutivshej nas progaliny, na minutku ostanovilsia, ustalo raskachivaias Na korotkih nozhkah, zatem dobrodushno osklabilsia i podnial ruku ladoniu vverh, Demonstriruia to, chto prines s soboj. Zhelaiu tebe udachi. ejisuminyon Q1FUW1pVckRcUFBGHUFCUEZWRlleXR1XVA==
